Package GameObjects

Interface BasicGameSpirit

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Box, Fruit, GameObject, Ghost, Packman, Player
    public interface BasicGameSpirit
    Interface for giving basic information/data for the implementing object to be instantiated as a GameSpirit object.
    Information such as starting values of width/height and image.
    Author:
    Ofek Bader

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      BasicGameSpirit clone()
      Cloning this BasicGameSpirit object with equal values but different pointer/reference
      int getInitialHeight()
      get the starting height value (size of the object / image)
      int getInitialWidth()
      get the starting width value (size of the object / image)
      Point3D getPoint()
      returns the 3D position.
      java.awt.Image getSpirit()
      get a copy of current Spirit image.
      void setInitialHeight​(int height)
      Set starting height value (size of object / image)
      void setInitialSize​(int width, int height)
      Set starting width & height values (size of object / image)
      void setInitialWidth​(int width)
      Set starting width value (size of object / image)
      void setSpirit​(java.awt.Image spirit)
      Set new Spirit image.
